changelog: v1.5.16: Crash Recovery — Eve logs startup crashes, diagnoses on next launch, JS error reporting, What's New null guards.
changes: NEW: Crash logging — launch.py wraps startup in try/except, writes crashes.jsonl + crash.flag on failure
NEW: Eve crash recovery — /api/eve/crash returns friendly diagnosis; popup shown on next launch
NEW: _diagnose_crash() — maps PermissionError / ModuleNotFoundError / port conflicts to plain English
NEW: /api/eve/jserror POST — dashboard window.onerror forwards JS errors to logs/jserrors.jsonl
FIX: What's New null guards — wnBuild/wnUpdate wrapped in try/catch + null checks on all DOM refs
FIX: WN_VER updated to 1.5.16 — users see latest What's New content on next open
